name: showTitleScreen
label: Show title screen
description: If checked, a title screen will show up when starting.

name: headline
label: Headline
description: Optional headline to show above cards.

fields.name: label
fields.label: Label
fields.description: Label for the content. The label will be set to the metadata title if no label, image or teaser is set.

fields.name: image
fields.label: Image
fields.description: Optional illustrative image.

fields.name: introduction
fields.label: Teaser
fields.description: Optional teaser for the content.

fields.name: restrictions
fields.label: Access restrictions
fields.description: Define how access to the content should be limited.

fields.name: starttime
fields.label: Start date
fields.description: Optionally, set date and time when the content becomes available.

fields.name: endtime
fields.label: End date
fields.description: Optionally, set date and time when the content becomes unavailable

fields.name: contentType
fields.label: Content
fields.description: Choose the type of content you would like to add.

name: behaviour
label: Behavioural settings
description: These options will let you control how the task behaves.

fields.name: displayContentState
fields.label: Display content state
fields.description: If checked, will display the contents state at the bottom of a card.

fields.name: enableRetry
fields.label: Enable "Retry" button
fields.description: If checked, allows users to reset all exercises of all cards at once.

fields.name: backgroundImage
fields.label: Background image
fields.description: Select an image to use as the background of the content.

fields.name: hasCardPadding
fields.label: Add padding to cards
fields.description: If checked, will some extra padding between the cards' border and the cards' content.

fields.name: cardWidth
fields.label: Card width
fields.description: Set the default card width as a CSS value (e.g. 100px or 14rem or 15em). If you leave out the unit, px will be assumed.

fields.name: imageSizing
fields.label: Image sizing
fields.description: Choose how content images should be sized.

fields.name: customRatioWidth
fields.label: Custom ratio width
fields.description: Set the horizontal ratio component for content images.

fields.name: customRatioHeight
fields.label: Custom ratio height
fields.description: Set the vertical ratio component for content images.

fields.name: introClamp
fields.label: Maximum teaser lines
fields.description: Set the maximum number of lines to display for the content teaser.

fields.name: start
fields.label: Start
fields.description: Label of start button.

fields.name: statusUnstarted
fields.label: Status: unstarted
fields.description: Status label for unstarted content.

fields.name: statusViewed
fields.label: Status: viewed
fields.description: Status label for viewed content.

fields.name: statusCompleted
fields.label: Status: completed
fields.description: Status label for completed content.

fields.name: statusCleared
fields.label: Status: cleared
fields.description: Status label for cleared content.

fields.name: untitledContent
fields.label: Untitled Content
fields.description: Fallback label.

fields.name: confirmResetHeader
fields.label: Reset confirmation dialog: header
fields.description: Header for dialog to confirm resetting all contents.

fields.name: confirmResetDialog
fields.label: Reset confirmation dialog: text
fields.description: Text for dialog to confirm resetting all contents.
fields.default: All your contents and their status will be reset, but your selection will remain as is. Do you want to proceed?

fields.name: confirmResetAllHeader
fields.label: Reset confirmation dialog: header
fields.description: Header for dialog to confirm resetting all contents and selections.

fields.name: confirmResetAllDialog
fields.label: Reset confirmation dialog: text
fields.description: Text for dialog to confirm resetting all contents and selections.
fields.default: All your contents and their status and your selections will be reset. Do you want to proceed?

fields.name: exerciseLabel
fields.label: Exercise description
fields.description: @label is a placeholder that will be replaced with the respective value.

fields.name: toolbar
fields.label: Toolbar description
fields.default: Toolbar. Use the key combination Alt plus T to focus the toolbar later on.
